page.title: 05BRITISH LEGION,GALA DAY
page.content: {THE ROYAL BRITISH LEGION-ACTIVITIES The Distington branch of the British Legion was formed in 1924.The Legion itself was founded after the First World War in 1918.The building was bought from the Harrington Presbyterian Church in 1937 for Â£150.Activities atthe club include :Snooker,darts and parties etc.They raise alot of money on Poppy Day also.Membership in 1985:1140 people. { SPECIAL EVENTS-GALA DAY The Parish Council organise Gala Day annually.It has stalls such as tombolas,raffles,flowers,cakes and tinned food.Races are held for both adults and children.There are competitions such as 5-a-side football,sprint race,sack race and find the hidden treasure competitions organised by the Vicar Mr.Woolcock.
